Keywords: Age of Apocalypse , Exiles , Generation X , Jean Grey School For Higher Learning , New Mutants , Utopia , X-Men
Real Name: Clarice Ferguson
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. When Blink makes an attack, after resolutions you may remove her RALLY die to place her or a hit character up to 5 squares from their current square. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls. When a character gains a RALLY die, place a die with the matching result on their card.)
SEE YA! WOULDN'T WANNA BE YA!: Phasing/Teleport. When Blink uses it, she has Passenger: 3, but only to carry friendly characters that share a keyword with her.

Comments
September 12, 2021
Mateodh
Pulled her in sealed with Sebastian Shaw. I didn't really know what to do with that combo until Round 2, but her Rally is really helpful when playing with pieces that have no move-and-attack. Parked Shaw in hindering and fed him high-value targets. Of course, I had luck with her attack rolls or that could've backfired.
August 12, 2021
Goop
I love figures like this that can "scorpion pull" your opponents to you. Good powers and stats as well.
